divs: sighting detailsnote 1: eye witness reported sighting to me.. on monday march 16th approximated 8:20pm, while letting his dogs out and wanting to observe the space shuttle and iss fly-over, the witness spotted a dark gray-ish triangular object silently flying over-head. 1. color: dark gray-ish 2. shape: triangular in shape 3. structure: solid yet "erie" transparent with slight shimmering edges. 4. sound: no sound was emitted. 5. heading of object: south\west towards north\east 6. location of sighting: colorado springs at austin bluffs and academy 7. lights: none observed 8. observation: roughly 30 seconds 9. flight pattern: straight, steady velocity no swerving. 10. size: at arms length, roughly palm sized, 3 to 4 inches in diameter. 11. feelings: anxiety, nervous, amazed note 2: local authorities were called, no other reported witnesses. note 3: witness was not under any current medication or alcohol. witness contacted me and i'm requesting mufon assign case to me to complete. i will contact airport tower and other local authorities requesting if any other sightings were submitted. witness will draw a picture of what he saw and email it to me. chuck zukowski mufon star investigator ;-) mufon field investigator colorado springs, co 719-213-4250
trends: There have been 106 other sightings in Colorado Springs
There were no other sightings in Colorado Springs on or around March 16th 2009
Summary: Observed flying triangle traveling SW to NE.
